graph_title: The volume of alcoholic beverages consumed by the household during a year (pure alcohol in liters).
indicator_name: The volume of alcoholic beverages consumed by the household during a year (pure alcohol in liters).
national_indicator_description: The volume of alcohol consumed by households per year in pure alcohol liters, divided by the total number of households.
computation_calculations: The indicator is calculated by the volume of alcohol consumed by households per year in pure alcohol liters, divided by the total number of households.
comments_limitations: The main source of information is a Integrated Living Conditions Survey (ILCS) (https://www.armstat.am/en/?nid=82&id=2217).
source_organisation_2: Integrated Living Conditions Survey of households (ILCS)
